audioText: Le chat tuera sûrement les oiseaux dans le jardin si on ne fait rien.
question: What will the cat definitely do to the birds in the garden?
options: Kill them if nothing is done
explanation: The text states 'Le chat tuera sûrement les oiseaux dans le jardin si on ne fait rien' - The cat will surely kill the birds in the garden if we don't do anything. 'Tuera' is the third person singular future form of 'tuer' (to kill).
